1.title: Showers
1.plot: James and Gheorghe argue with their better halves that they need to make more money. James comes up with a laundry list of ideas in the car on the way to the party. Big Boss Man Steve is keeping a kids party warm for them but all hell brakes loose when the two are late and Steve lays down the law.

2.title: Pizza, Pizza!
2.plot: Gheorghe and Masha fight over a racy photography shoot she did. James comes over disguised as a pizza guy and hatches the twos first business. After some convincing Gheorghe goes along with it and the two delivery their first pizza. Their first customer is less than accommodating and Steve finds out of the new business venture.

3.title: The Set Up
3.plot: Gheorghe and James getting a disturbing letter from the Clown Union. After Kassy enlightens them that they need to pay a tax for every pizza they deliver they enlist the help of a lawyer. She lines up a meeting and all the characters battle it out for all the marbles in Steve's restaurant lair. Henchmen and all!

4.title: Charles in Charge
4.plot: As the pizza business heats up Gheorghe and James disagree on what to do with the profits. Jenny and James flaunt their new found riches at a club while Jenny starts to flirt with the help in front of James. Masha is excited about a photo shoot but Gheorghe needs to go get his clown suit for a delivery. All hell brakes loose as Charles the drycleaner has other ideas rather than a simple pick up of Gheorghe's suit. Old friends stop by and try and mitigate the situation.

5.title: The Deal
5.plot: Jenny and James fire into a huge fight about how she is handling her budding acting career. Gheroghe and James deliver a pizza shortly after to Mr. Jules who wants to absorb their business into his pizza empire. A surprise ending let us know who is really behind the acquisition.

6.title: Models and Money
6.plot: Jenny apologizes for the way she has been acting and invites Gheorghe and James to her photo shoot. The two meet with Mr. Jules first to sell their business with a small catch. When James and Gheorghe show up at the photo shoot they are surprised as the plot thickens with a photographer they know all to well.

imdb.plot outline: Two immigrants Gheorghe and James work as clowns and are trying to live the American Dream. The two likable losers try to hatch scheme after scheme to make money and thwart their arch nemesis Big Clown Boss Man Steve. Every conceivable obstacle comes in their way but the two press on hell bent on bringing their two significant others, Jenny and Masha to the promised land of wealth, happiness and sanity! Debauchery ensues from a zany cast of characters all committed to making life not so dreamy.
imdb.title: Lucky Days
plot: Two immigrants Gheorghe and James work as clowns and are trying to live the American Dream.
